paper.title: Modeling genetic algorithms with Markov chains

paper.abstract: We model a simple genetic algorithm as a Markov chain. Our method is both complete (selection, mutation, and crossover are incorporated into an explicitly given transition matrix) and exact; no special assumptions are made which restrict populations or population trajectories. We also consider the asymptotics of the steady state distributions as population size increases.
